#include<bits/stdc++.h>
int budget,n;
int items[109][2];
struct node
{
	int tcost;
	int tenjoy;
};
struct  node dp[109][505];
struct node cost(int i,int usedmoney)
{
	struct node s1,s2,s;
	if(i==n)
	{
		s.tcost=0;
		s.tenjoy=0;
		return s;
	}
	if(dp[i][usedmoney].tcost!=-4)
	{
	return dp[i][usedmoney];}
	s1.tcost=1000000000;
	s2.tcost=1000000000;
	s1.tenjoy=-1;
	s2.tenjoy=-1;
	if(usedmoney<=budget)
	{
		if(usedmoney+items[i][0]<=budget)
		{
			s1=cost(i+1,usedmoney+items[i][0]);
			s1.tcost+=items[i][0];
			s1.tenjoy+=items[i][1];
		}
		s2=cost(i+1,usedmoney);
	}
	if(s1.tenjoy>s2.tenjoy)
	s=s1;
	else if(s2.tenjoy>s1.tenjoy)
	s=s2;
	else
	{
		if(s1.tcost<s2.tcost)
		s=s1;
		else
		s=s2;
	}
	dp[i][usedmoney]=s;
	return s;
}
int main()
{
	while(1)
	{
		scanf("%d%d",&budget,&n);
		if(budget==0&&n==0)
		break;
		int i,j;
		for(i=0;i<109;i++)
		{
			for(j=0;j<502;j++)
			{
				dp[i][j].tcost=-4;
				dp[i][j].tenjoy=-4;
			}
		}
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		scanf("%d%d",&items[i][0],&items[i][1]);
		struct node sum=cost(0,0);		
		printf("%d %d\n",sum.tcost,sum.tenjoy);
	}
}
